subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Roger Goodell is returning to Capitol Hill, this time to testify about the case of two players whose suspensions for violating the N.F.L.’s anti-doping policy were blocked in court.
snippet: Roger Goodell is returning to Capitol Hill, this time to testify about the case of two players whose suspensions for violating the N.F.L.’s anti-doping policy were blocked in court.
